name: Steward Cat's Gift II
description: The reward for adventurers who have completed Level II Guild Challenge. It should be full of the encouragement of Steward Cat.

name: Steward Cat's Gift III
description: The reward for adventurers who have completed Level III Guild Challenge. It should be full of the encouragement of Steward Cat.

name: Steward Cat's Gift IV
description: The reward for adventurers who have completed Level IV Guild Challenge. It should be full of the encouragement of Steward Cat.

name: Steward Cat's give away
description: (Probably will receive more when guild challenge is completed) Steward Cat's reward for your efforts on guild challenge. Please open it up.

name: Steward Top Hat
description: Super dashing custom hat kept by Steward Detura, its so dashing that he will only put on this hat during important meetings!

name: Sticky Mucus
description: An unknown viscous liquid. I wonder what you can make with it?

name: Sticky Rice Dumpling
description: The fragrance of bamboo leaf and the softness of sticky rice!!  Is it supposed to be sweet or salty?  Gain double Base and Job Exp from killing monsters for 1 hour after use! (Buff’s remaining time elapses when you’re dead and when you’re out of combat but not when you’re offline)

name: Stiletto
description: A Stiletto made in the need of the practicality of the knife edge.

name: Stiletto [2]
description: A Stiletto made in the need of the practicality of the knife edge.

name: Sting Composer [1]
description: Everyone is following Mr. Sting's conducting. Just join this music feast!

name: Sting hat
description: A wet mud hat made according to the look of Sting. It didn't take the wearer's feelings into consideration.

name: Sting hat Blueprint
description: A wet mud hat made according to the look of Sting. It didn't take the wearer's feelings into consideration.

name: Sting hat [1]
description: A wet mud hat made according to the look of Sting. It didn't take the wearer's feelings into consideration.

name: Stone Arrow
description: Arrow made of hard rocks. Own the Str of land.

name: Stone Buckler
description: The shield made from meteorite stone, Extremely hard.
effect: Damage from L-size monsters -25%,Green Steel Pike IV ＋ Greaves  VII ＋ Stone Buckler IV: Ignores 5% Def, ＋5% Atk
